p: Recombinant NS1DENV1–4 proteins were used as the detection antigen in ELISA assays for anti-dengue antibody detection. Results obtained for anti-dengue IgM ( Table 2, Figure 5A–D) showed 85–91% sensitivity and 91–93% specificity, and for anti-dengue IgG ( Table 3, Figure 6A–D), 83–87% sensitivity and 81–93% specificity were found. Graphs were reproduced from the ROC curve, and the 95% CI (confidence interval) and best cut-off for each assay were defined.
